I know.translation[0].definitions[0].def: used to agree with someone or to say that you feel the same way
I know.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: ‘We have to talk about it, Rob.’ ‘Yeah, I know.’
I know.translation[0].definitions[1].def: used to say that you have suddenly had an idea, thought of a solution to a problem etc
I know.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: I know! Let’s go out for a meal on your birthday.
I know.translation[0].definitions[2].def: used to stop someone from interrupting because they have an opinion about what you are saying
I know.translation[0].definitions[2].exa: It sounds silly, I know, but I will explain.
I know, I know, I should have had the car checked out before now.
